dat255.refugeemap.app.gui.helper

Class SavedEventsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • dat255.refugeemap.app.gui.helper.SavedEventsHelper

  • public class SavedEventsHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to handle the local storage of Event saved by the user. Also initiates graphic updates of relevant Fragment when saving/removing an Event.
